brand_info.name: UNIQLO
brand_info.positioning: Global everyday apparel brand focused on simple, high-quality clothing engineered through textiles innovation and designed to make life better (LifeWear).
brand_info.vision: Redefine everyday clothing by continually improving it through thoughtful design and innovation so it better supports people's lives.
brand_info.mission: To create truly great clothing with new and unique value, and to enable people all over the world to experience the joy, happiness and satisfaction of wearing such great clothes; and to enrich people's lives while growing in unity with society.
brand_info.origin_story: Originates from a Yamaguchi, Japan textiles business founded in 1949; the UNIQLO retail brand began with a unisex casual wear store opened in Hiroshima in 1984 and later expanded globally under Fast Retailing.

brand_values.brand_promise: Simple, functional, long-lasting clothing made better through fabric innovation and practical details, designed for everyone.
differentiators: LifeWear concept (clothes designed to make life better)
Textile and materials innovation (e.g., functional innerwear and lightweight insulation)
Clean, consistent brand system with strong global retail presence
non_negotiables: Functional everyday focus over seasonal trend theatrics

psychographics.lifestyle: People who prioritize comfort, versatility, and dependable basics for work, leisure, travel, and daily life
psychographics.behavior: Repeat purchasing of essentials, seasonal replenishment, wardrobe-building through core items and functional layers

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Product-led and benefit-led with minimal, pragmatic language
tone_dos: Let product performance and everyday scenes carry the story
tone_donts: Abstract brand jargon without product meaning

logo.primary_logo: Red square brandmark with white UNIQLO logotype (Japanese and Latin variants)
logo.usage_rules: Used as a clear stamp-like brandmark; never distorted; kept high-contrast and legible
logo.lockup_behavior: Often placed as a small corner stamp or clean end-card; consistent spacing around the mark
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals at least the height of the UNIQLO wordmark within the square

color_system.color_usage_rules: High-contrast red-and-white brandmark paired with clean neutrals; seasonal product colors appear as accents rather than brand-wide palette shifts

layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Product and people-led with minimal copy
layout_principles.cta_placement: Lower area or near product callouts
layout_principles.alignment: Straightforward, often centered or left-aligned for clarity

preferred_photographers: Varies by market and season; consistent LifeWear campaign system
style.camera_feel: Candid, approachable lifestyle with controlled simplicity
style.pose_guidelines: Natural movement and comfort; relaxed posture; authentic interactions; minimal posing
style.casting_attitude: Inclusive, everyday realism; multi-age and multi-ethnicity; calm confidence

technical.lighting: Soft daylight or clean studio light
technical.depth_of_field: Medium to shallow depending on product focus
technical.color_grading: Natural, clean whites, accurate fabric color

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Clearly readable product with fit and fabric behavior visible
product_presentation.styling_approach: Simple layering, tonal coordination, functional styling
avoid: Busy visual clutter that hides garment details

motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts, minimal effects; product callouts when needed

visual_dos: Use clean backgrounds and negative space
Keep colors accurate and lighting honest
copy_donts: Ambiguous poetic claims without product relevance

digital.tone_adjustment: More product-spec and utility-forward online; simple lifestyle cues on social

platform_behavior.Instagram: Clean lifestyle sequences and seasonal LifeWear story tiles
platform_behavior.Website: Product-first pages with clear fit, fabric, and function callouts
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Feature-led with simple hero visuals and direct utility copy

print.cover_rules: Simple hero image with minimal copy and clear brandmark

logo_misuse_examples: Brandmark placed on complex patterns reducing legibility
